Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Location! Really Nice Hotel!! Couldnt have been happier!”
Reviews.Author: emmie_newyork
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights christmas holiday lobby impressive nice bar bar food worth extra superior king size massive comfortable bed bathroom adequate little shabby clean lots space clothes shopping downside hot night wasnt noisy window location brilliant grand central favourite restaurant micheal jordans blokes time square major attractions overall decor little dated bit shabby round edges enjoyed stay def rate expedia probably cheaper rack rate worth penny didnt dealings staff didnt complain friendly
